entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 29 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then clearing. Blowing snow at times. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this morning then light late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 29 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 43 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
